Key Match Events: Monank Patel hit the fastest boundary in the first over (six singles)
Towhid Hridoy and Mahmudullah knitted a 67-run partnership
Towhid Hridoy scored a half-century (58 runs)
USA won the match by 5 wickets
Harmeet Singh took the Player of the Match award
Pre-Game Insights: Monank Patel, the USA skipper, said that the spinners were tidy with the ball and gave them a chance to chase
Harmeet Singh, the Player of the Match, said that it was a great feeling to take the 1-0 lead and that the team stuck till the end
Najmul Hossain Shanto said they didn't bat well and felt extra 20 runs could have made the difference
Post-Match Reflections: Monank Patel, the USA skipper, said that the team was happy with the way they played and that they were going well till the 8th over with the bat
Harmeet Singh, the Player of the Match, said that they backed themselves and stuck till the end
Najmul Hossain Shanto said that the batters struggled on the wicket and that they hoped for a better performance in the next match
Miscellaneous Highlights: The USA won the toss and chose to bowl
The match took place in Houston
The score was 153/6 for Bangladesh in 20 overs
The target was 154 runs for USA in 20 overs
